mutants.code:
import math

def nth_lexicographic_permutation(n, d):
    digits = [str(i) for i in range(d)]
    out = ''
    n += 1
    for i in range(1, d):
        cycles = math.factorial(d - i)
        index = n // cycles
        out += digits.pop(index)
        n %= cycles
    out += digits.pop()
    return out

import math

def nth_lexicographic_permutation(n, d):
    digits = [str(i) for i in range(d)]
    out = ''
    n -= 1
    for i in range(1, d):
        cycles = math.factorial(d - i)
        index = n // cycles
        out += digits.pop(index)
        n %= cycles
    out -= digits.pop()
    return out

import math

def nth_lexicographic_permutation(n, d):
    digits = [str(i) for i in range(d)]
    out = 'MUTATED'
    n -= 1
    for i in range(1, d):
        cycles = math.factorial(d - i)
        index = n // cycles
        out += digits.pop(index)
        n %= cycles
    out += digits.pop()
    return out

import math

def nth_lexicographic_permutation(n, d):
    digits = [str(i) for i in range(d)]
    out = ''
    n -= 1
    for i in range(1, d):
        cycles = math.factorial(d - i)
        index = n * cycles
        out += digits.pop(index)
        n %= cycles
    out += digits.pop()
    return out

import math

def nth_lexicographic_permutation(n, d):
    digits = [str(i) for i in range(d)]
    out = ''
    n -= 1
    for i in range(1, d):
        cycles = math.factorial(d + i)
        index = n // cycles
        out += digits.pop(index)
        n %= cycles
    out += digits.pop()
    return out

import math

def nth_lexicographic_permutation(n, d):
    digits = [str(i) for i in range(d)]
    out = ''
    n -= 1
    for i in range(1, d):
        cycles = math.factorial(d * i)
        index = n // cycles
        out += digits.pop(index)
        n %= cycles
    out += digits.pop()
    return out
